channel.title: Changing the ip a client goes to?
channel.description:
i have a really awesome 582 source, at least i think it is, anyway, i have a client for it, i can get on, but my friend cant? he needs to change the clients ip to my ip, we don't know how? , and if you can, can you please post a link to a client with an ip changer ? :) Much appreciated
X AGE X :)
